name: rayfine
title: Rayfine
description: A better way to execute blockchain transactions
author: RoyDevelops

commands.name: merchantmoe
commands.title: Swap on Merchant Moe
commands.subtitle: Rayfine
commands.description: Swap via merchant moe dex aggregator

commands.name: lendle-supply
commands.title: Lendle Supply
commands.subtitle: Rayfine
commands.description: Supply assets to Lendle lending protocol

commands.name: lendle-withdraw
commands.title: Lendle Withdraw
commands.subtitle: Rayfine
commands.description: Withdraw assets from Lendle lending protocol

commands.name: lendle-borrow
commands.title: Lendle Borrow
commands.subtitle: Rayfine
commands.description: Borrow assets from Lendle lending protocol

commands.name: lendle-positions
commands.title: Lendle Positions
commands.subtitle: Rayfine
commands.description: View Lendle positions and account health

commands.name: meth-position
commands.title: mETH Position
commands.subtitle: Rayfine
commands.description: View mETH balances and token addresses

commands.name: meth-swap-to
commands.title: Stake WETH to mETH
commands.subtitle: Rayfine
commands.description: Swap WETH to mETH via DEX

commands.name: meth-swap-from
commands.title: Swap mETH to WETH
commands.subtitle: Rayfine
commands.description: Swap mETH to WETH via DEX

commands.name: pyth-price
commands.title: Pyth Price
commands.subtitle: Rayfine
commands.description: Get token price from Pyth oracle

commands.name: agni-swap
commands.title: Swap on Agni Finance
commands.subtitle: Rayfine
commands.description: Swap tokens via Agni Finance DEX

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
